segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing at the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that plate, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the faucet is running full blast and the sink is overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the edge, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the puddle already, but she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy is climbing on a wobbly stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies with one hand and holding a plate with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, reaching up expectantly for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so sneaky, hoping the woman doesn't turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, totally unaware of the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
